content.raw:
Is this issue still in consideration?
Log playback speed is a limiting factor for us, our logs play over 4 times faster than real time, and some of the software can't keep up with that.

Both a number of steps/second as command line argument, or something akin to real-time factor would be great.

if I understand correctly, if nothing happens on gazebo no steps are recorded, right? I believe that these periods of time where there are no steps should be respected, at least there should be the option of respecting them.
content.html:
Is this issue still in consideration? Log playback speed is a limiting factor for us, our logs play over 4 times faster than real time, and some of the software can't keep up with that.

Both a number of steps/second as command line argument, or something akin to real-time factor would be great.

if I understand correctly, if nothing happens on gazebo no steps are recorded, right? I believe that these periods of time where there are no steps should be respected, at least there should be the option of respecting them.
